GlutTimer Class Reference

#include <GlutTimer.h>

Collaboration diagram for GlutTimer:

[legend]

Detailed Description

This class abstracts a glut timer registers all relevant call backs these call backs can be overriden in classes that inherit form this one This class uses the observer pattern through the boost signals library it also uses boost thread to implement the singleton pattern.
